summary: This document describes Jeffrey Epstein's pattern of using promises of career advancement in entertainment, modeling, and philanthropy to lure women. It specifically mentions a Polish model and details a 2014 meeting where she was photographed with several of Epstein's high-profile connections.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Described as making promises to women to get them jobs or opportunities in films, modeling, and philanthropy to lure them.

persons.name: Woody Allen
persons.context: Mentioned as someone Epstein claimed he could get women into films with, and was photographed with the Polish model at Epstein's townhouse in 2014.

persons.name: Ehud Barak
persons.context: Photographed with the Polish model at Epstein's townhouse in 2014, identified as one of Epstein's VIP connections.

persons.name: Bill Gates
persons.context: Photographed with the Polish model at his office near Seattle in 2014, identified as one of Epstein's VIP connections.

connections.description: Epstein used Allen's name to lure women with promises of film roles, and Allen was photographed with a model at Epstein's townhouse.
Barak was photographed with a model at Epstein's townhouse, identified as one of Epstein's VIP connections.
Gates was photographed with a model at his office, identified as one of Epstein's VIP connections.
Epstein promised the model help getting involved at the Gates Foundation and photographed her with his VIP connections in 2014.

events.title: Model photographed with Epstein's connections
events.description: A Polish model was photographed meeting with Ehud Barak at Epstein's townhouse, Woody Allen at the townhouse, and Bill Gates at his office near Seattle.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein used promises of career advancement in Woody Allen films, Victoria's Secret modeling, and the Gates Foundation to lure women.
Epstein specifically promised a Polish model he could help her get involved at the Gates Foundation.
In 2014, Epstein photographed the Polish model during meetings with several of his VIP connections: Ehud Barak and Woody Allen at his townhouse, and Bill Gates at Gates's office near Seattle.
